about_the_game:
Sombra is a 2D platformer game with a charming pixel art style, where you guide a frightened little cat to the exit of the cave she has fallen into. Your goal is to overcome dangers and traverse various environments, from dark caves and ancient underground ruins to a lush forest, to help her find her way home.

Features

  • Sombra is scared: You can't control the direction she runs.

  • One-button gameplay: Use just one button on your mouse, keyboard, or controller to interact.

  • Progression with new abilities: Start with the ability to jump and unlock more powers as you advance.

  • Purposeful collectibles: Collect fish along the way to unlock exclusive photos in the game’s gallery.

9 Lives Mode

Can you guess what this mode is about? Once you complete the game, you'll unlock this special challenge mode, where you’ll only have 9 lives to finish the entire adventure. Can you bring Sombra home safe and sound?

Help this timid little cat overcome her fears and find her way back home.
